title: Can the effect of Twilight Ninja Getsuga, the Shogun be activated if you have no available Monster Zones?
question: Can the effect of Twilight Ninja Getsuga, the Shogun be activated if you have no available Monster Zones?
llm_answer: No, the effect of Twilight Ninja Getsuga, the Shogun cannot be activated if you have no available Monster Zones. This is because Getsuga's effect summons a "Ninja" monster from your hand or Graveyard, which requires an open Monster Zone.
